info.name: IS_DISTRIBUTION_POINTS_SECURED_TL
info.description: The TL MUST be published "in a secure manner".

info.name: IS_SERVICE_EXTENSION_ASI_ALLOWED
info.description: This service needs a specific Additional Service Information Extension due to is service type. [TS119612 V2.1.1 - 5.5.9.4 additionalServiceInformation Extension]

info.name: IS_X509CERTIFICATE_ORGANIZATION_MATCH
info.description: The Organization field in Subject Distinguished Name shall match one of the "Name" or "Trade Name" values of the Service Provider.

info.name: IS_X509CERTIFICATE_CONTAINS_CORRECT_KEY_USAGES
info.description: KeyUsage extension shall be set to digitalSignature and/or to nonRepudiation (contentCommitment) to the exclusion of any other KeyUsage value.

info.name: IS_X509CERTIFICATE_CONTAINS_TSLSIGNING_EXT_KEY_USAGE
info.description: ExtendedKeyUsage extension should be present containing id-tsl-kp-tslSigning.

info.name: IS_X509CERTIFICATE_ORGANIZATION_MATCH
info.description: The Organization field in Subject Distinguished Name shall match one of the "Scheme operator name" values.
